name: Build Different
description:
"An action-based shooter with a visual novel story, set in a world of mecha and war, following the party who have found the true cause of its chaos and go on a reckless mission to try and save their world"

GamePlay
Take control of an alien war machine, in this third-person shooter you will need to dodge the enemy fire and retaliate in turn. Glide through the area to avoid projectiles and then blow your way through with boosted speed.
Through this journey, you will form bonds with your companions in a visual novel style.  Experience the story of this world and unravel what is throwing it into chaos.

(IMPORTANT: this game does contain flashing images)

Story
The world of Terriando has been plagued with war and chaos for as long as anyone can remember, in the modern age machines of war have been used to wipe out millions of lives. Through all this only two nations remain standing;

Hearos: a desert city where the rich live in comfort and the poor must struggle day by day. It holds the largest military of the nations but many of its soldiers are there not by choice, but because it is the only way to live.

Nixiem: a city in the northern land of snow and ice, while being smaller than Hearos they hold some of the most advanced technology the people of the world have seen. Their agents have spread throughout the world, hidden in plain sight and ready to strike at their leader's command.

The world of Terriando is large, but we will be focusing on the story of four individuals and how they will shake the world as a whole. This project is a 2nd-year student game developed by a small team of University students.

Controls
W.A.S.D - Movement
R - Reload
Shift - Sprint
Spacebar - Dodge
Mouse Movement - Aiming
Mouse L.click - Fire
